description: Gets the details of a transaction.

parameters.name: transactionId
parameters.description: The identifier of a Bitcoin transaction. It is generated when a transaction is created.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The blockchain network where the transaction occurred.

nested_items.name: transaction
nested_items.description: Contains the details of the transaction.

nested_items.name: network
nested_items.description: The blockchain network where the transaction occurred.

nested_items.name: blockHash
nested_items.description: The block hash is a unique identifier for a block. It is a fixed-size string that is calculated by using the information in the block. The block hash is used to verify the integrity of the data in the block.

nested_items.name: transactionHash
nested_items.description: The hash of a transaction. It is generated when a transaction is created.

nested_items.name: blockNumber
nested_items.description: The block number in which the transaction is recorded.

nested_items.name: transactionTimestamp
nested_items.description: The Timestamp of the transaction.

nested_items.name: transactionIndex
nested_items.description: The index of the transaction within a blockchain.

nested_items.name: numberOfTransactions
nested_items.description: The number of transactions in the block.

nested_items.name: to
nested_items.description: The identifier of the transaction. It is generated whenever a transaction is verified and added to the blockchain.

nested_items.name: from
nested_items.description: The initiator of the transaction. It is either in the form a public key or a contract address.

nested_items.name: contractAddress
nested_items.description: The blockchain address for the contract.

nested_items.name: gasUsed
nested_items.description: The amount of gas used for the transaction.

nested_items.name: cumulativeGasUsed
nested_items.description: The amount of gas used up to the specified point in the block.

nested_items.name: effectiveGasPrice
nested_items.description: The effective gas price.

nested_items.name: signatureV
nested_items.description: The signature of the transaction. The Z coordinate of a point V.

nested_items.name: signatureR
nested_items.description: The signature of the transaction. The X coordinate of a point R.

nested_items.name: signatureS
nested_items.description: The signature of the transaction. The Y coordinate of a point S.

nested_items.name: transactionFee
nested_items.description: The transaction fee.

nested_items.name: transactionId
nested_items.description: The identifier of a Bitcoin transaction. It is generated when a transaction is created.

nested_items.name: confirmationStatus
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the transaction has reached Finality.

nested_items.name: executionStatus
nested_items.description: Identifies whether the transaction has succeeded or failed.
